smg.text: Mainly cloudy. Mist. A few light rain patches. Force 3 to 4 east to southeasterly winds.
Cloudy. Mist. A few showers. A few thunderstorms later. Force 2 to 4 east to southeasterly winds with gusts.
Cloudy. Showers. A few thunderstorms. Force 3 to 4 easterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
Mainly cloudy. Mist in the morning and at night. One or two showers. Force 3 to 4 south to southeasterly winds.
Mainly cloudy. Mist. A few showers. Force 2 to 3 southerly winds.
Temperature falling. Mainly cloudy. A few rain patches. Force 3 to 5 north to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Mainly cloudy. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
